name: CUPHEAD MOBILE
description:
Hi Funs!
Cuphead is a classic run and gun action game heavily focused on boss battles.
Play as Cuphead or Mugman as you traverse strange worlds, acquire new weapons, learn powerful super moves, and discover hidden secrets while you try to pay your debt back to the devil!
developers: GAMES WORLD KERESKEDELMI ES SZOLGALTATO BT
publishers: GAMES WORLD KERESKEDELMI ES SZOLGALTATO BT
